name: tournament_standings
description: Team Rankings for a specific competition.

tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament. Default: 6
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: daily_match_list_scheduled
description: Daily match list including scheduled matches. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

date.description: The date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.
date.title: Date

name: tournament_teams
description: List of teams participating in a specific tournament.

tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament. Default: 6
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: tournament_info
description: Current season, stage structure(divisions,conferences etc.), country and many more information about a tournament.

tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament. Default: 6
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: tournament_fixture
description: Full match list with period and final scores.

tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament. Default: 6
tournamentId.title: Tournamentid

name: tournament_list
description: List of tournaments in your data coverage.

name: daily_match_list_all
description: Daily match list including scheduled, live and finished matches. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

date.description: The date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.
date.title: Date

name: daily_match_list_live
description: Daily match list including live matches. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

date.description: The date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.
date.title: Date

name: daily_match_list_results
description: Daily match list including finished matches. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

date.description: The date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.
date.title: Date

name: recent_match_list
description: Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters. **The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Ice Hockey Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

matchId.description: The id of the match. Default: 106557
matchId.title: Matchid
